description._content: Image taken from: Title: "An Illustrated Catalogue of British Fossil Sponges. Accompanied by the original descriptions of the various families, genera, and species; and a chronological bibliography of papers and works relating to the classification of recent and fossil Sponges. No. 1" Author: MACKIE, Samuel Joseph. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 7105.dd.26." Page: 5 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1866 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 002324016 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals. If you wish to purchase a high quality copy of the page that this image is drawn from, please order it here. Please note that you will need to enter details from the above list - such as the shelfmark, the page, the book's volume and so on - when filling out your order.
